title: Small Group Exercise - V and V and Peer Reviews

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the Activity
The purpose of this exercise is to further develop and understanding of what a V&V is and whether or not a peer review can accomplish the role of a V&V

attachment: 03 Small Group Exercise - V_V and Peer Reviews.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Exercise - V and V and Peer Reviews
